purpose: The Department of Computer Science at NOVA University Lisbon is inviting applications for six full-time, tenure-track Assistant Professor faculty positions.
evidence_sentences: The Department of Computer Science at NOVA University Lisbon invites applications for six full-time, tenure-track Assistant Professor faculty positions in Computer Science.
We are primarily interested in recruiting excellent candidates in the areas of the departmentâ€™s research groups on Computer Systems, Intelligent Systems, Multimodal Systems, and Software Systems.
Exceptional candidates in other areas of Computer Science will also be considered.
Tenured-level (Associate and Full Professor) applications are also welcome.
For full consideration, first-stage applications must be received by *May 29, 2025*.
